SRL also include a function to detected you logged in status.
But HEY! Nice try.

item.title: My auto talker
item.dc:creator: @shock -shock-
item.description:
@shock wrote:

This is (one of) my first scripts. i did this a long time ago and i found it when i was board and looking through the bowls of my hard drive . in the script it says that the creator is “wild” the reason that my username is now -shock- is because it was so long ago and i forgot about my old username “wild” compleatly…

the script does not use any includes.
it might not work anymore because i have not used for ever…

anyway here it is:

[scar]
//Wild’s Autospammer V1.0
//Fetures:
//Auto login
//Checks if you are logged in
//And of course spammes

program Wildsspammer;
Const
{setup}
Username= ‘some randon username’; //Your username
Password= ‘some random password’; //Your password
Text= ‘’; //The text that you want to spam
time= ‘4000’; //Time to wait between spams (in millisectonds)
{end setup}
procedure Login;
begin
Writeln (‘We need to log in! loging in…’)
MoveMousesmooth(477,289)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(477,289,true)
wait(100);
MoveMousesmooth(367,255)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(367,255,true)
SendKeys(username)
wait(100);
MoveMouseSmooth(366,272)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(366,272,true)
SendKeys(password)
wait(100);
MoveMousesmooth(319,320)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(319,320,true)
wait(5000)
ClickMouse(319,320,true)
wait(3500);
end;
Procedure clickoff;
begin
ClickMouse(0,509,true)
end;
procedure Talk;
begin;
SendKeysSilent(Text+chr(13)); // The string of text is typed then enter is hit
wait(time);
end;
procedure LoginCheck;
begin
If(getcolor(268,141)=2869963) and (getcolor(268,141)=2869963) then // IF i get color and get another color at the coords THEN!
Writeln (‘Oops! we are logged out!’);
Login;
end;
begin
Writeln (‘’)
Writeln (’* You are useing wilds Autospammer V1.0 *’)
Writeln ('’)
wait(2000);
clickoff;
LoginCheck;
repeat
Talk;
Until(false)
end.
[/scar]

my powerminer is currently 10% compleat.
